title: Repo sync

details: Added `updated_at` timestamp field to multiple objects in REST API schemas (e.g., `branch_restriction_policy`, `branch_protection`, `status_check_policy`).
Introduced `description` field for cost centers in billing API, including request/response examples and feature flag (`billing_add_cost_center_description`).
Updated SHA references in config files.

- Introduced `description` field for cost centers in billing API, including request/response examples and feature flag (`billing_add_cost_center_description`).
- Updated SHA references in config files.

Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added `updated_at` timestamp field to multiple objects in REST API schemas (e.g., `branch_restriction_policy`, `branch_protection`, `status_check_policy`).
- Introduced `description` field for cost centers in billing API, including request/response examples and feature flag (`billing_add_cost_center_description`).
- Updated SHA references in config files.

### Title
Add updated_at field and cost center description to REST schemas
